meanings.definition: The act of making something beautiful or more attractive.
meanings.sent1: The beautification of the park brought many visitors.
meanings.sent2: The city council invested in the beautification of the downtown area.
meanings.sent3: The beautification of the garden made the squirrels very happy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a beautification of the room.
meanings.sent5: The beautification of the old building was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The process of improving the appearance of a place or object.
meanings.sent1: Beautification projects can enhance the overall look of a neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The beautification of the school playground made the students excited to play.
meanings.sent3: The beautification of the street lamps made them look like elegant dancers.
meanings.sent4: The beautification of the town square transformed it into a vibrant gathering place.
meanings.sent5: The beautification of the storefronts attracted more customers to the area.
